title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: User is experiencing a persistent authentication loop despite entering correct credentials and clear browser cache.

title: Payment Failed - Card Declined
description: The transaction was rejected by the processor with a 'Stripe Error 402'. User confirmed the bank is not blocking the request.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: Clicking the 'Download PDF' link triggers a server 500 error instead of initiating the file transfer for invoice INV-9902.

title: Incorrect Billing Address
description: System failed to save the updated ZIP code in the user profile, causing shipping calculations to remain linked to the old state.

title: App Crash on Launch
description: Application logs show a NullPointerException immediately after the splash screen on specific Samsung Galaxy devices.

title: Refund Not Processed
description: The refund for order #9822 shows as 'Approved' in the admin panel but hasn't appeared on the customer's bank statement after 14 days.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Issue
description: The SMS gateway is failing to deliver OTP codes to international mobile carriers, preventing the user from bypassing the security wall.

title: Unable to Update Profile Picture
description: The image uploader returns a 'Format not supported' error even though the user is attempting to upload a standard 500kb PNG file.

title: Subscription Auto-Renewal
description: The 'Auto-renew' toggle button is grayed out in the settings menu, preventing the user from securing their next billing cycle.

title: Missing Order Confirmation Email
description: Transactional emails are not being triggered for new orders; user has checked both primary and promotional folders without success.
